product_overview: TACTIC is a Laravel-based HRIS for Tunisian enterprises providing employee lifecycle management (users, teams, attendance, leave, payroll, recruitment, skills) plus an AI service for predictions and candidate ranking. The backend exposes a JWT-protected REST API and integrates with a separate FastAPI AI service and Laravel Reverb for real-time features.
core_goals: Provide secure, role-based REST APIs for full HR lifecycle (RH, manager, employee)
Automate Tunisian payroll calculations and build PDF payslips
Support attendance and leave workflows with approval, justification and reporting
Support recruitment pipeline with AI candidate ranking and manager/HR collaboration
Expose AI predictions and KPIs via a separate FastAPI service; ensure clear fault behavior when AI service is unavailable
Preserve audit trails and use soft-delete/archive flows for safe data operations

features.name: Authentication API
features.description: JWT-based user authentication: login/logout, token refresh, profile and password management for all roles.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with valid credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token and user object -> GET /api/auth/me with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 with current user profile

POST /api/auth/refresh with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 with new JWT token -> POST /api/auth/logout with Authorization: Bearer <new token> -> Receive 200 success message -> GET /api/auth/me with the logged-out token -> Receive 401 Unauthorized
POST /api/auth/change-password with Authorization: Bearer <token> and valid current_password/new_password -> Receive 200 success message
POST /api/auth/change-password with Authorization: Bearer <token> and invalid current_password -> Receive 422 validation error

features.name: User Management API
features.description: List, search, create, update, soft-delete, restore and archive users; RH-only operations enforced by role checks.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with valid RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/utilisateurs with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 with list of users

POST /api/auth/login with valid RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/utilisateurs with Authorization: Bearer <token> and valid user payload -> Receive 201 with created user object -> PUT /api/utilisateurs/{id} with Authorization: Bearer <token> and changes -> Receive 200 with updated user object
POST /api/auth/login with valid employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/utilisateurs with Authorization: Bearer <employee token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden
GET /api/utilisateurs/{nonexistentId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 404 Not found

features.name: Account Requests API
features.description: Employee self-registration via invite tokens: submit requests, validate tokens, set initial password; RH reviews pending requests.
user_flows: POST /api/account-requests with {nom, prenom, email} (public) -> Receive 200 success message -> Email sent containing invite token by system
GET /api/account-requests/validate-token/{token} (public) -> Receive 200 Token valid -> POST /api/account-requests/set-password with {token, password} (public) -> Receive 200 success message
GET /api/account-requests/validate-token/{invalidToken} (public) -> Receive 404 Invalid token
POST /api/account-requests/set-password with expired_or_invalid_token -> Receive 422 validation error or 404

features.name: Team Management API
features.description: Create and manage teams, assign managers and members. RH can create/update/delete teams; managers can view their own team.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/equipes with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {nom, chef_id} -> Receive 201 Team object -> PUT /api/equipes/{id}/chef with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated team object
POST /api/auth/login with manager credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/equipes/my-team with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Team object
POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/equipes with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden
GET /api/equipes/{nonexistentId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 404 Not found

features.name: Attendance API
features.description: Employee clock-in/out, mark absences, justify absences and view personal or team attendance; RH/Managers have extended access and reporting.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/pointages/entree with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Pointage object (clock-in) -> POST /api/pointages/sortie with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated Pointage object (clock-out)
POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/pointages/today with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Pointage[]
POST /api/pointages/sortie without prior entree (Authorization: Bearer <token>) -> Receive 422 validation error or 400 indicating missing clock-in
POST /api/pointages/absence with Authorization: Bearer <manager_or_rh_token> and {utilisateur_id,date,motif} -> Receive 200 Pointage object

features.name: Leave Management API
features.description: Submit and manage leave requests; employees submit, managers/RH approve or reject, medical files downloadable for approvers.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/conges with Authorization: Bearer <token> and valid {type,date_debut,date_fin,motif} -> Receive 201 Conge object -> GET /api/conges/mes-conges with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Conge[]

POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/conges/{id}/approuver with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated Conge object and user's solde_conge decremented
POST /api/conges with Authorization: Bearer <token> and invalid date range -> Receive 422 validation error
POST /api/conges/{id}/approuver with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden

features.name: Payroll API
features.description: Automated payroll generation and simulation using Tunisian tax rules, PDF payslip download, bulk generation and payment marking (RH only for generation/validation).
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/paies/simuler with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {utilisateur_id,periode_debut,periode_fin} -> Receive 200 Simulation result

POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/paies/generer with Authorization: Bearer <token> and valid payload -> Receive 200 Paie object -> POST /api/paies/{id}/valider with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated Paie object
POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/paies/{id}/download with Authorization: Bearer <token> (for own payslip) -> Receive 200 PDF file
POST /api/paies/generer with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden
GET /api/paies/{nonexistentId}/download with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 404 Not found

features.name: Position Management API
features.description: Create and manage job positions/titles used in assignments and recruitment; RH-only write operations.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/postes with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {titre,description} -> Receive 201 Poste object -> GET /api/postes with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Poste[]
POST /api/postes with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden
GET /api/postes/{nonexistentId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 404 Not found

features.name: Skills Management API
features.description: CRUD for skills/competencies; RH can create/update/delete skills; skills used in user profiles and assignments.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/competences with Authorization: Bearer <token> and valid {nom,categorie} -> Receive 201 Competence object -> GET /api/competences with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Competence[]
PUT /api/competences/{id} with Authorization: Bearer <token> and updates -> Receive 200 Updated Competence object
POST /api/competences with Authorization: Bearer <token> and missing required fields -> Receive 422 validation error
POST /api/competences with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden

features.name: Assignments API
features.description: Manage employee-to-position assignments with start and end dates; RH performs create/update/terminate operations.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/affectations with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {utilisateur_id,poste_id,date_debut} -> Receive 201 Affectation object -> GET /api/affectations/utilisateur/{id} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Affectation[]
POST /api/affectations/{id}/terminer with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 Updated Affectation object
POST /api/affectations with Authorization: Bearer <token> and invalid utilisateur_id or poste_id -> Receive 422 validation error
POST /api/affectations with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden

features.name: Job Recruitment Pipeline API
features.description: End-to-end recruitment: manager job requests, HR job posts publishing, employee applications, and AI candidate ranking.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with manager credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/job-requests with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {poste_id,description} -> Receive 201 JobRequest object -> POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/job-requests/{id}/approve with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated JobRequest object -> POST /api/job-posts with Authorization: Bearer <token> and job post data -> Receive 201 JobPost object -> POST /api/job-posts/{id}/publish with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 updated JobPost object

POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> POST /api/applications with Authorization: Bearer <token> and {job_post_id} -> Receive 201 Application object -> POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/ai/match/{jobPostId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 ranked candidates array
POST /api/job-requests with Authorization: Bearer <employee_token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden
POST /api/applications with Authorization: Bearer <token> for a closed job_post -> Receive 422 validation error or 400 indicating closed posting

features.name: Dashboard API
features.description: Role-specific dashboards (RH/Manager) exposing KPIs, attendance trends and absence distribution for decision making.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/dashboard/all with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 dashboard data object
GET /api/dashboard/attendance-trend with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 trend data array
POST /api/auth/login with employee credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/dashboard/all with Authorization: Bearer <employee token> -> Receive 403 Forbidden

features.name: AI Module API
features.description: AI-powered endpoints provided by a separate FastAPI service: attendance prediction, performance scoring, candidate ranking and AI KPIs â€” requires the AI service to be running.
user_flows: POST /api/auth/login with RH credentials -> Receive 200 with JWT token -> GET /api/ai/health with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 health status
GET /api/ai/predictions/attendance/{userId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 prediction object
GET /api/ai/match/{jobPostId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> -> Receive 200 ranked candidates array
GET /api/ai/match/{jobPostId} with Authorization: Bearer <token> when AI service is not running -> Receive 502 Bad Gateway or 503 Service Unavailable

tech_stack.other: JWT Authentication (php-open-source-saver/jwt-auth), Laravel Reverb (WebSocket), FastAPI AI Service (Python/PyTorch)

known_limitations.impact: AI endpoints will fail if FastAPI service is not started

known_limitations.issue: Payroll uses hardcoded Tunisian CNSS/IRPP tax brackets
known_limitations.impact: Tax calculations only valid for Tunisian legal framework

known_limitations.issue: Real-time features require Laravel Reverb to be running
known_limitations.impact: WebSocket notifications unavailable if Reverb is not started
